attributes.action: Put the people of Britain First
attributes.additional_details: This petition has been set up to help the people of Britain get what they are entitled to and a have a voice. Many of us are told by our doctors or the hospital that we are unable to work only to have our benefits stopped as the DWP and the Government laws feel we are able to work, I ask you all is this fair to us
attributes.background: Too many in Britain are told on a daily bases that their benefits are being stopped as they don't meet the requirements even though they are told be doctors and hospitals they can't work
